name: Endless Cave (zooid)
description:
Flappy Bird variation starring a little bat flying through a cave.

Originally the game was developed in Construct 2 and abandoned. After years I decided to finish it but realized the developers of Construct 2 has ruined the engine in an attempt to push their new Construct 3 which introduces a subscription model. Decided to try and re-implement the game in Godot and managed to do it faster there. There are still features I am planning to add whenever I have spare time.

I hope you enjoy it.
